major_collections.name: NormMacDonaldArchive1
major_collections.description: The most comprehensive Norm Macdonald video archive from r/normmacdonald

Stand-up Comedy: White House Correspondents Dinner (1997) - Full performance
Just for Laughs recordings (1986) - Rare early material
Radio Interviews: Various radio show calls and interviews
Book Promotions: Based on a True Story book tour interviews (2016)

major_collections.name: Norm Macdonald Live Podcast
major_collections.description: Complete archive of the Norm Macdonald Live podcast (2013-2017)

major_collections.name: Sports Show with Norm Macdonald
major_collections.description: Norm's short-lived Comedy Central sports show from 2011
content: Norm's unique take on sports news
major_collections.note: Cancelled due to sensitivity from sports figures being roasted

major_collections.name: Norm Macdonald MKV Archive
major_collections.description: Curated collection in MKV format from r/normmacdonald Google Sheets

major_collections.name: Based on a True Story Audiobook
major_collections.description: Complete audiobook of Norm's memoir read by himself
major_collections.chapters: Multiple parts covering his full memoir

secondary_collections.name: The Norm Show (480p)
secondary_collections.content: Complete episodes from the TV series

secondary_collections.name: Norm Macdonald (1959-2021) Collection
secondary_collections.description: Another comprehensive collection focusing on late-night appearances
content: Based on a True Story audiobook parts

secondary_collections.name: Usenet Archive - alt.fan.norm-macdonald
secondary_collections.description: Early internet forum discussions about Norm Macdonald
secondary_collections.content: Historical Usenet newsgroup posts and discussions

secondary_collections.name: I'm Not Norm Compilation
secondary_collections.description: Best of compilation spanning various topics
secondary_collections.content: Curated highlights covering Hitler to Stalin, 9/11 to current events

search_tips: Search 'norm macdonald' OR 'norm macdonald' in Internet Archive
Filter by collection type (videos, audio, texts)
Many files have multiple formats available
Some collections have extensive metadata and descriptions
Audio files often have both streaming and download options
notable_missing_content: Normism: The Philosophy of Norm Macdonald by Max West - NOT FOUND in any collection
Some SNL Weekend Update segments may be missing due to NBC copyright
Certain radio appearances may be incomplete
Some live performances exist only as bootlegs
